Package main.core.elevatorsubsystem

Class ElevatorStatusObj

java.lang.Object
main.core.elevatorsubsystem.ElevatorStatusObj
public class ElevatorStatusObj
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides a data structure for usage in communicating between Scheduler and Elevator.
Author:
Tony Zeidan, Evan Lloyd, Shaopeng Liu, Leenesh Kumar, YouHeng Zhou, Dominic Motora

  • Constructor Details

    • ElevatorStatusObj

      public ElevatorStatusObj​(int[] senderID, int elevatorID)
      Default constructor for instances of ElevatorStatusObj. Initializes a new message with the associated elevator values.
      Parameters:
      senderID - The ID of the sender (when sending via packets)
      elevatorID - The ID of the elevator (elevator number)

    • ElevatorStatusObj

      public ElevatorStatusObj​(int[] senderID, int elevatorID, int floor, java.util.Queue<java.lang.Integer> destinations, java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> panelLights, ElevatorState elevatorState)
      Another constructor for instances of ElevatorStatusObj. Initializes a new message with the associated elevator values.
      Parameters:
      senderID - The ID of the entity using this object (anything)
      elevatorID - The ID of the elevator that this object is associated with
      floor - The current floor of the elevator
      destinations - The destination queue for the elevator
      panelLights - The unordered collection of panel lights that are on
      elevatorState - The state of the elevator

    • ElevatorStatusObj

      public ElevatorStatusObj​(int[] senderID, int elevatorID, int floor, java.util.Queue<java.lang.Integer> destinations, java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> panelLights, ElevatorState elevatorState, boolean doorErrorFlag, boolean motorErrorFlag)
      Another constructor for instances of ElevatorStatusObj. Initializes a new message with the associated elevator values.
      Parameters:
      senderID - The ID of the entity using this object (anything)
      elevatorID - The ID of the elevator that this object is associated with
      floor - The current floor of the elevator
      destinations - The destination queue for the elevator
      panelLights - The unordered collection of panel lights that are on
      elevatorState - The state of the elevator
      doorErrorFlag - The status of the door error flag
      motorErrorFlag - The status of the motor error flag

      public java.net.DatagramPacket toPacket​(int port) throws java.net.UnknownHostException

      Parameters:
      port - The port of the destination
      Returns:
      The packet form of the object
      Throws:
      java.net.UnknownHostException - When the local host can not be resolved
